phrs.translation: 别致地, 名字, 帅地

sentences.sentence: Hold your head high and walk on chicly. Don't keep so many things on your mind, it was not your fault.
sentences.translation: 扬起头，潇洒地向前走吧，不要那么心事重重，这不是你的错。

sentences.sentence: On our way, who can face all the conditions success or failures chicly, all which we experience can bring us so many thoughts.
sentences.translation: 人生路上，有几人能够如此潇洒面对，成功亦或是失败，总能带给我们很多思考。
